argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | estrcbas.c | |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | estrcbas.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 3 |  | estrchomfval.h | |- H = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 4 |  | estrchom.x | |- ( ph -> X e. U ) |
| 5 |  | estrchom.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) |
| 6 |  | estrchom.a | |- A = ( Base ` X ) |
| 7 |  | estrchom.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_estrchomfval | |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. U , y e. U |-> ( ( Base ` y ) ^m ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( y = Y -> ( Base ` y ) = ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_oveqan12rd | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( ( Base ` y ) ^m ( Base ` x ) ) = ( ( Base ` Y ) ^m ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 6 | #P_oveq12i | |- ( B ^m A ) = ( ( Base ` Y ) ^m ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( ( Base ` y ) ^m ( Base ` x ) ) = ( B ^m A ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( ( Base ` y ) ^m ( Base ` x ) ) = ( B ^m A ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( B ^m A ) e. _V |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( B ^m A ) e. _V ) |
| 17 | 8, 14, 4, 5, 16 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ph -> ( X H Y ) = ( B ^m A ) ) |
